trans-unit.source: Represents a view for grouping, sorting, filtering, and navigating a data collection.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en visning for gruppering, sortering, filtrering og navigering i en datainnsamling.

trans-unit.source: You should not create objects of this class in your code.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette objekter av denne klassen i koden.

trans-unit.source: To create a collection view for a collection that only implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, create a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> object, add your collection to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A> property, and get the collection view from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Til å opprette en samling visning for en samling som implementerer bare <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, Opprett en <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>objekt, legge til samlingen din til den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>egenskapen og få samlingen vise fra den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: You can think of a collection view as a layer on top of a binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se en samling visning som et lag på en binding kildesamlingen som gjør det mulig å navigere og vise samlingen basert på sortering, filter og gruppe spørringer uten å endre underliggende kildesamlingen seg selv.

trans-unit.source: If the source collection implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface, the changes that raise the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event are propagated to the views.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kildesamlingen implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>grensesnitt endringene hever den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsen er overført til visningene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Because a view does not change the underlying source collection, a source collection can have multiple views associated with it.
trans-unit.target: En visning ikke endre underliggende kildesamlingen, og kan en kildesamlingen ha flere visninger som er knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: By using views, you can display the same data in different ways.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av visninger, kan du vise de samme dataene på forskjellige måter.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use two views on a collection of `Task` objects to show tasks sorted by priority on one part of the page and grouped by area on another part of the page.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke to visninger i en samling av `Task` objektene som skal vises oppgaver sortert etter prioritet på en del av siden og gruppert etter område på en annen del av siden.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications, all collections have an associated default collection view.
trans-unit.target: I [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programmer, alle samlinger har en tilknyttet standardsamlingen vise.

trans-unit.source: Rather than working with the collection directly, the binding engine always accesses the collection through the associated view.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å anvende samlingen direkte bindingen motoren alltid har tilgang til samlingen via den tilknyttede visningen.

trans-unit.source: To get the default view, use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha standardvisningen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An internal class based on CollectionView is the default view for collections that implement only <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: En intern klasse som er basert på CollectionView er standardvisningen for samlinger som implementerer bare <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> is the default view for collections that implement <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>er standardvisningen for samlinger som implementerer <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList></xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> is the default view for collections that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>er standardvisningen for samlinger som implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView></xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class and then bind your control to that view.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette en visning av samlingen i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>klasse og deretter binder kontrollen til denne visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the CollectionView class.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>klassen er den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representasjon av klassen. CollectionView</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [slik: sortering og gruppe Data ved hjelp av en visning i XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se "Binding til samlinger" i [Data Binding oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To set a view in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class.
trans-unit.target: Angi en visning i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], Bruk <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the CollectionView class, and it exposes the most commonly used members of the CollectionView class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>er det [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representasjon av klassen CollectionView, og den viser de mest brukte medlemmene av CollectionView-klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref> class that represents a view of the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"> </xref> klasse som representerer en visning av den angitte samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> is bound to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher of the caller of this constructor.

trans-unit.source: The underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende samlingen.

trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen støtter filtrering.

trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen returnerer `false`, aktiveres i <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>egenskapen oppstår det et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen støtter gruppering.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to test whether the view supports sorting before adding <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å undersøke om visningen støtter sortering før du legger til <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the view supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen støtter sortering.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to test whether the view supports sorting before adding <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å undersøke om visningen støtter sortering før du legger til <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override this property to indicate whether they support sorting.
trans-unit.target: Avledede klasser overstyre denne egenskapen til å angi om de støtter sortering.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Clears any pending changes from the change log.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle ventende endringer fra endringsloggen.

trans-unit.source: Clears unprocessed changed to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner ubehandlet endret til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the view has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når visningen er endret.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that you can use to compare items in the view.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som du kan bruke til å sammenligne elementer i visningen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> object that you can use to compare items in the view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>objekt som du kan bruke til å sammenligne elementer i visningen.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item belongs to the view.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om det angitte elementet tilhører visningen.

trans-unit.source: This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjort ikke noen antatte om elementet hører til den underliggende samlingen.

trans-unit.source: If the caller knows that the item belongs to the underlying collection, it is more efficient to call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.PassesFilter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis oppkalleren vet at elementet tilhører den underliggende samlingen, er det mer effektivt å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.PassesFilter%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.PassesFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to check.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal se.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item belongs to the view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet tilhører visningen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of records in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall poster i visningen.

trans-unit.source: If a filter is set, this property value only includes items that pass the filter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et filter er angitt, inneholder verdien for denne egenskapen bare elementer som sendes filteret.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying collection is of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, this is an O(N) operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den underliggende samlingen er av typen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, dette er en O(N)-operasjon.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: This value is cached until the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er bufret til samlingen endres.

trans-unit.source: The number of records in the view, or –1 if the number of records is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Antall oppføringer i visningen eller -1 Hvis antall poster er ukjent.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information to use during sorting.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kulturen informasjonen som skal brukes under sortering.

trans-unit.source: The culture information to use during sorting.
trans-unit.target: Kulturinformasjon som skal brukes under sortering.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*> is changing.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>endrer.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende element i visningen.

trans-unit.source: Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen visninger støtter begrep for en gjeldende oppføring pekeren.

trans-unit.source: As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Mens du navigerer gjennom objektene i en samling visning, kan du skal flytte postpekeren en som gjør det mulig å hente objektet som finnes på den bestemte plasseringen i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Note that moving the current record pointer has some interactions with any sorting or filtering that is applied to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at flytte gjeldende registrere pekeren har noen samhandling med noen sortering eller filtrering som brukes i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Sorting preserves the current record pointer on the last record selected, but the collection view is restructured around it.
trans-unit.target: Sortering beholder endrer på den siste posten som er valgt, men samlingen visningen restrukturert rundt den.

trans-unit.source: (Perhaps the selected record was at the beginning of the list before, but now the selected record might be somewhere in the middle.) Filtering preserves the selected record if that selection remains in view after the filtering.
trans-unit.target: (Kanskje den valgte posten ble på begynnelsen av listen før, men nå den valgte posten kan være et sted i midten.) Filtrering beholder den valgte posten hvis valget fortsatt i visningen etter filtreringen.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the current record pointer is set to the first record of the filtered collection view.
trans-unit.target: Ellers er endrer satt til den første posten av visningen filtreres samling.

trans-unit.source: The current item of the collection is bound to automatically if the target of a binding is a singleton value.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende element i samlingen er bundet til automatisk hvis målet for en binding er en singleton-verdi.

trans-unit.source: If the target is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the current item is synchronized with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis målet er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, gjeldende element synkroniseres med det valgte elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a list box is bound to a collection, the CurrentItem is synchronized with the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en liste er bundet til en samling, synkroniseres CurrentItem med det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The current item of the view.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende element for visningen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the first item of the collection starts as the current item.
trans-unit.target: Det første elementet i samlingen starter som gjeldende element som standard.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordinal position of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*> within the (optionally sorted and filtered) view.
trans-unit.target: Henter ordenstall posisjonen for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>i visningen (eventuelt sorterte og filtrerte).</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*> within the (optionally sorted and filtered) view.
trans-unit.target: Ordenstallet posisjonen for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>i visningen (eventuelt sorterte og filtrerte).</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem*>

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: Angir en Utsett syklus som du kan bruke til å slå sammen endringer i visningen og forsinkelse automatisk oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope.
trans-unit.target: Vanlig bruk er å opprette en `using` område med denne metoden, og Plasser flere endring av visningen anrop innenfor området.

trans-unit.source: This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.
trans-unit.target: Dette forsinker automatiske oppdateringer til Utsett syklus er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IDisposable> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IDisposable>objekt som du kan bruke til å fjerne kall objektet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Removes the reference to the underlying collection from the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner referansen til den underliggende samlingen fra den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.CollectionView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to unsubscribe to events on the underlying collection and allow the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å abonnere på hendelser i den underliggende samlingen og at den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>er ugyldige samlet.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en metode som brukes til å finne ut om et element brukes til å bli med i visningen.

trans-unit.source: Simpler implementations do not support filtering and throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Enklere implementeringer ikke støtter filtrering og iverksett <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanFilter%2A> property to test if filtering is supported before assigning this property with a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanFilter%2A>til å teste om filtrering støttes før du tilordner egenskapen med en ikke-null-verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: Representant som representerer metoden som brukes for å finne ut om et element brukes til å bli med i visningen.

trans-unit.source: The current implementation does not support filtering.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende implementering støtter ikke filtrering.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som du kan bruke til å liste opp elementer i visningen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objekt som du kan bruke til å liste opp elementer i visningen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the item at the specified zero-based index in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet i den angitte nullbaserte indeksen i visningen.

trans-unit.source: This method evaluates the index with any <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A> property values that are set on the view.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden evaluerer indeksen med noen <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>egenskapsverdiene som er angitt i visningen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the underlying collection is of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, this is an O(N) operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den underliggende samlingen er av typen <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, dette er en O(N)-operasjon.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The item at the specified zero-based index in the view.
trans-unit.target: Elementet i den angitte nullbaserte indeksen i visningen.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that describes how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"> </xref> objekter som beskriver hvordan elementene i samlingen er gruppert i visningen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is always `null` because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class does not support grouping over its underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er alltid `null` fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>klassen støtter ikke gruppering over den underliggende samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: The derived classes <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> do support grouping.
trans-unit.target: De avledede klassene <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>og <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>støtter gruppering.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index at which the specified item is located.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen som det angitte elementet finnes.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns an index other than -1, it must always be true that view[index-1] < item <= view[index], where the comparisons are done using the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the view, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden returnerer en indeks enn -1, den må alltid være true visningen index-1 < item=""> <= view[index],="" where="" the="" comparisons="" are="" done="" using="" the=""></=> <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for visning, hvis det finnes en.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This particular behavior of the method is used by some <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event handlers to speed up reaction to insertion and deletion.
trans-unit.target: Dette bestemt for metoden brukes av noen <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>hendelsesbehandling raskere forhold til innsetting og sletting.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the derived class does not override this method, a listener does a binary search using the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den utledede klassen ikke overstyre denne metoden, har en lytter binære ved hjelp av <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the view needs to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om visningen må oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates if the internal state of the view has changed and requires a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om den interne tilstanden for visningen er endret, og krever en <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>metodekallet.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: The typical scenario is if a <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> or similar has been added to the view while the view is in a deferred refresh cycle (see <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Det vanlige scenariet er hvis en <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>eller lignende er lagt til i visningen mens visningen er i en utsatt oppdateringssyklus (se <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, no explicit call to <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A> is needed; as soon as the deferred refresh cycle ends, the view calls refresh automatically.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet vil ingen eksplisitt kall til <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>kreves; så utsatt oppdateringssyklus avsluttes, visningen kaller oppdatering automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the view needs to be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis visningen må oppdateres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is in the collection to represent a new item.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som finnes i samlingen til å representere et nytt element.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView> has <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition>, the NewItemPlaceholder is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>som implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView>har <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A>satt til <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition>, NewItemPlaceholder er lagt til i samlingen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition> </xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: The NewItemPlaceholder always appears in the collection; it does not participate in grouping, sorting, or filtering.
trans-unit.target: NewItemPlaceholder vises alltid i samlingen. den finnes ikke i gruppering, sortering eller filtrering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A> cannot be the NewItemPlaceholder.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>kan ikke være NewItemPlaceholder.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods that perform relative navigation, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext%2A>, skip the NewItemPlaceholder.
trans-unit.target: Metodene som utfører relativ navigasjonsruten, som den <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext%2A>, Hopp over NewItemPlaceholder.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToFirst%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToLast%2A> skip the NewItemPlaceholder if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A> is set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition>, respectively.

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> to the returned (empty) collection because the base class <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> does not support sorting.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke legge til en <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>til returnerte (tom) samling fordi basisklassen <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>støtter ikke sortering.</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> </xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the derived classes <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> that do support sorting.

trans-unit.source: Also, check the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanSort%2A> property before adding or removing <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> objects to avoid an exception.
